name: Cosmic Collision HD Demo
description:
A ten level demo of our upcoming game Cosmic Collision.

Experience our game before release.

* Beautiful moving backgrounds in HD quality.

* Nine unique power-ups.

* Save up power-ups and credits, even if you're out of lives.

* Challenging boss battles.

The full version will include:

* Many more levels and stages, each stage with it's own unique background and boss battle.

* More and more challenging levels, and new gameplay mechanics.

* achievements.

* Improved highscore system.
